title: Train Fault Causing Delays Between Orchard and Gardens by the Bay

title_translations.zh-Hans: 火车故障导致 Orchard 和 Gardens by the Bay 之间延误
title_translations.ms: Kerosakan Kereta Api Menyebabkan Kelewatan Antara Orchard dan Gardens by the Bay
title_translations.ta: ரயில் கோளாறு காரணமாக Orchard மற்றும் Gardens by the Bay இடையே தாமதம்

updates.text: [TEL]: No more additional travelling time between Orchard and Gardens by the Bay in both directions. Train service resumed.
[TEL]: Due to a train fault, additional travelling time of 10mins between Orchard and Gardens by the Bay in both directions.
Due to a train fault, additional travelling time of 10mins between Orchard and Gardens by the Bay in both directions.
